name: Toy Story Mania!
description:
Inspired by the Disney/Pixar feature film Toy Story, Toy Story Mania! is
now headed exclusively to Wii. Join all the classic Toy Story characters
in Toy Story Mania! as Woody, Buzz and the gang stage their own zany,
fun-filled carnival! Celebrate the joy of play with family and friends
of all ages and face-off in the ultimate living room showdown. Features

•Experience a variety of over 25 fun-filled games

Fast and frenetic gameplay for everyone of all ages

Play with up to 4 players competitively and cooperatively

Exclusive levels in 3-D
